snippet: Rory McIlroy was named the winner of the P.G.A. of America Player of the Year award and the Vardon Trophy, for best scoring average.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy was named the winner of the P.G.A. of America Player of the Year award and the Vardon Trophy, for best scoring average.

headline.seo: Rory McIlroy Named P.G.A.’s Top Player
